segments.text: Hi , Jenny . Are you going to school now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup . I have English at 9 in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Got any plans after the class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will have our midterm exams next month . I plan to look for some important books and study at the library . Do you want to join me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I need to return some books . They are due today . Besides , I can also read some weekly publications , magazines and newspapers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . We can go to the swimming pool in the gymnasium after that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea . We can chill out a little in such a hot summer . Are you good at swimming ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's a good question . I haven't swum for almost two years . I think I need more practice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's almost 9 . I need to hurry . I am running late now . See you after class in front of the library then . Bye !
segments.speaker: S2
